project.name: SADL
project.title: SHAKEN Action Description Language
project.status: Work begin in January 2001, with the first version completed in February 2001. Work is ongoing in migrating SADL to the various components of SHAKEN and in enhancements needed to support more complex process representations in RKF Year 2, and to support simulation.

description.short: SADL is the action description language used by the various parts of the SHAKEN knowledge acquisition system, to represent processes. It is designed to be small and simple, yet expressive enough to represent processes from the molecular biology domain in SHAKEN.
description.long: More details of the version of SADL that was frozen on Feb 14 2001 can be found here.
